channel.title: Wild areas! need hlpe please!
channel.description:
Ok so i changed my home to varrok bank but its all wildy and i was wondering how do i make it were bank is safe and the rest is wildy? please help me.
note iam using homiescape.

item.title: Wild areas! need hlpe please!
item.dc:creator: @DdsScape DdsScape
item.description:
@DdsScape wrote:

Thank you so much dude! i would love if you could come on by our forms and server forums r ddsvietscape.smfforfree.com[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 13, 2009, 10:49:21 pm[/size][hr]It worked your a beast!!
Can you come by our chatbox and hlpe me out somemore?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 20, 2009, 12:32:52 pm[/size][hr]ok i need more hlep how in my source it says everything is safe and i tihnk i just made the edgeville bank safe but now i wanna make the wild say “wildy” so i was wondering instead of a box like how u showed me do i do it in a straight line?

Read full topic

item.title: Wild areas! need hlpe please!
item.dc:creator: @koopa_king koopa king
item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Go into your client class and search “public boolean nonWild()”. Then add in the coordinates there to make the bank safe.

                       [v absY <= ####]
                       --------X---------
                       |                       |
                       |                       |

[absX >= #### >] X X [< absX <= ####]
| |
| |
--------X---------
[^ absY >= ####]

I hope my drawing makes it easy for you to understand it. =/

Read full topic
